question: ☕️bnha  ☕️voltron  ☕️theatre
answer:
oh wow good MORNING 

send me a ☕️ and a topic and I’ll talk about how I feel about it

bnha - i love it so much it’s hard to put into words. there was a point in my life where it was the only thing that could make me feel better, and still to this day it always improves my mood. i just love it so fucking much man

voltron - i have a LOT of mixed feelings about the v slur. like i spent two years of my life on it and when i think back to everything it could have been i just get,,,,sad. like yeah there was the initial anger of everything that went wrong but just knowing all of the wasted potential jsut makes me so sad ya know. i met some great friends because of it though and have some great memories of it so it’ll always hold a place in my heart

theatre - i fucking love it man theres not more to say it’s helped me open up and be such a more confident person because fuck dude im not that great now with confidence but before i started theatre i literally had zero self worth. i love every aspect of theatre to death and the fact i probably wont be able to do it ever again after i graduate high school in the next couple of months really fucking bums me out

reblog.comment:

blog.description: things that were 100% definitely said in boku no hero academia. not spoiler free. tracking the tag #incorrectbnhaquotes. submissions open!

summary:
Yaoyorozu: Oh man, I forgot my earbuds for this 4-hour trip. It’s a shame no one is willing to share their music.
Jirou,...
body:
Yaoyorozu: Oh man, I forgot my earbuds for this 4-hour trip. It’s a shame no one is willing to share their music.
Jirou, blushing and holding out an earbud: Here.
Yaoyorozu, immediately taking the opportunity to lay on Jirou’s shoulder: My savior!
[in the back]
Tsuyu: Momo has earbuds. I can see them sticking out of her bag.

summary: Oblivion - Simplyfx - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Oblivion - Simplyfx - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
description:
Oblivion.

In which Katsuki and Izuku works together as pro heroes and are best friends, but Katsuki has a secret. He is in love with Deku but the latter is oblivious so Katsuki decides to bottle up his feelings as he sees Deku jumping from relationship to relationship. Now if only Deku looked his way

summary: I think Ochako might be the biggest ship launcher in the BNHA Fandom - there are so many Ochaships, I wanted to ask - do you...
question: I think Ochako might be the biggest ship launcher in the BNHA Fandom - there are so many Ochaships, I wanted to ask - do you have a favorite? (for real, she's paired with everyone: Shoto, Momo, Mina, Jirou, Toga, etc).
answer:
Ochako is super shippable because she’s cute and badass and friendly to just about everyone but doesn’t put up with anyone’s shit. it does not surprise me at all that fanworks!Ochako gets around! I do indeed have some favorite Ochako pairings and they are as follows:

Kacchako - I think I mentioned in my fanfic rec post that this accidentally became one of my favorite pairings out of nowhere. they have only two interactions of any real significance in canon (and one of those interactions is only semi-canon, but I think the character book is a legit enough source), but damned if those interactions aren’t shippable as fuck. they have so much to offer one another. Bakugou inspires Ochako to push herself to her limits. he took her seriously as an opponent in the sports festival, and that fight led to her deciding to intern with Gunhead’s agency and becoming even more of a badass, which in turn has built her confidence. so he’s indirectly responsible for a lot of her character growth. meanwhile, Ochako can see right through his tough guy posturing and isn’t afraid to call him on his shit, which I love. so much, oh my god. and the best thing about it is that even when she gets angry with him, she’s still Ochako and thus inherently pure and sweet, and so that anger is lined with an underlying care and concern. she wants him to be better because she’s a good person and she cares about him and she knows he can be a better person too with just a little bit of effort. it’s just a great dynamic with so much potential for them to bring out the best in each other.

BakuDekuOcha OT3 Whatever You Call This - okay, basically this is because I love her friendship with Deku and it’s canon that she has feelings for him and I’m not just going to ignore that lol. but. because I love Bakugou and Kacchako too as previously stated, I prefer this OT3 to regular ol’ Dekuraka or whatever you call it. the combination of Deku + Ochako together has the potential to top the absolute shit out of Bakugou, and holy shit. basically this is one of my favorite pairings in the series, full stop.

Iidaraka - MY ORIGINAL OCHAKO OTP. I STILL LOVE IT. I adore how they interact, and how she clearly thinks Iida is the cutest ever (because he is), and knows him so well, and they’re just so comfortable with each other. and frankly, whoever is lucky enough to end up dating Iida Tenya had better be grateful for the rest of their damn lives. he would be the most devoted, loving, and adorably awkward boyfriend ever. meanwhile I think Ochako is one of the people that Iida relies on to steady himself. just like, a calming, loving, supportive presence, which is so essential when you’re as naturally uptight as this 40-year-old android. so yeah, these two just click.

OchaTsu - I think Tsuyu is Ochako’s closest female friend in the series for sure. they’re both founding members of the Dekusquad or whatever you call it, they both interned together, Ochako was the one Tsuyu trusted and relied on that first night in the dorms when Tsu was feeling miserable over what happened with the Bakurescue, and so on. they have got each other’s back. probably the only reason I don’t ship it more is because it’s almost too healthy lol. if that even makes sense. basically, the only genre you could write for these two would be fluff, because there would never be any conflict between them. they are both too kind and caring and sensible and have their shit together lol. that being said, they are still great.

anyways, I think that’s it for my biggest Ochako ships. these are the main ones because these are the characters have had the majority of interaction with her in canon. but honestly I think she’d gel pretty well with just about anyone and I could probably be converted to just about any Ochaship tbh.

Ochako is super shippable because she’s cute and badass and friendly to just about everyone but doesn’t put up with anyone’s shit. it does not surprise me at all that fanworks!Ochako gets around! I do indeed have some favorite Ochako pairings and they are as follows:

Kacchako - I think I mentioned in my fanfic rec post that this accidentally became one of my favorite pairings out of nowhere. they have only two interactions of any real significance in canon (and one of those interactions is only semi-canon, but I think the character book is a legit enough source), but damned if those interactions aren’t shippable as fuck. they have so much to offer one another. Bakugou inspires Ochako to push herself to her limits. he took her seriously as an opponent in the sports festival, and that fight led to her deciding to intern with Gunhead’s agency and becoming even more of a badass, which in turn has built her confidence. so he’s indirectly responsible for a lot of her character growth. meanwhile, Ochako can see right through his tough guy posturing and isn’t afraid to call him on his shit, which I love. so much, oh my god. and the best thing about it is that even when she gets angry with him, she’s still Ochako and thus inherently pure and sweet, and so that anger is lined with an underlying care and concern. she wants him to be better because she’s a good person and she cares about him and she knows he can be a better person too with just a little bit of effort. it’s just a great dynamic with so much potential for them to bring out the best in each other.

BakuDekuOcha OT3 Whatever You Call This - okay, basically this is because I love her friendship with Deku and it’s canon that she has feelings for him and I’m not just going to ignore that lol. but. because I love Bakugou and Kacchako too as previously stated, I prefer this OT3 to regular ol’ Dekuraka or whatever you call it. the combination of Deku + Ochako together has the potential to top the absolute shit out of Bakugou, and holy shit. basically this is one of my favorite pairings in the series, full stop.

Iidaraka - MY ORIGINAL OCHAKO OTP. I STILL LOVE IT. I adore how they interact, and how she clearly thinks Iida is the cutest ever (because he is), and knows him so well, and they’re just so comfortable with each other. and frankly, whoever is lucky enough to end up dating Iida Tenya had better be grateful for the rest of their damn lives. he would be the most devoted, loving, and adorably awkward boyfriend ever. meanwhile I think Ochako is one of the people that Iida relies on to steady himself. just like, a calming, loving, supportive presence, which is so essential when you’re as naturally uptight as this 40-year-old android. so yeah, these two just click.

OchaTsu - I think Tsuyu is Ochako’s closest female friend in the series for sure. they’re both founding members of the Dekusquad or whatever you call it, they both interned together, Ochako was the one Tsuyu trusted and relied on that first night in the dorms when Tsu was feeling miserable over what happened with the Bakurescue, and so on. they have got each other’s back. probably the only reason I don’t ship it more is because it’s almost too healthy lol. if that even makes sense. basically, the only genre you could write for these two would be fluff, because there would never be any conflict between them. they are both too kind and caring and sensible and have their shit together lol. that being said, they are still great.

anyways, I think that’s it for my biggest Ochako ships. these are the main ones because these are the characters have had the majority of interaction with her in canon. but honestly I think she’d gel pretty well with just about anyone and I could probably be converted to just about any Ochaship tbh.
trail.content:

I adore how they interact, and how she clearly thinks Iida is the cutest ever (because he is), and knows him so well, and they’re just so comfortable with each other. and frankly, whoever is lucky enough to end up dating Iida Tenya had better be grateful for the rest of their damn lives. he would be the most devoted, loving, and adorably awkward boyfriend ever. meanwhile I think Ochako is one of the people that Iida relies on to steady himself. just like, a calming, loving, supportive presence, which is so essential when you’re as naturally uptight as this 40-year-old android. so yeah, these two just click.
